item.title: Why use an Interview Kit?
item.description: Creating an interviewing kit creates a standardized approach to the interviewing process. Having that consistency offers many benefits for the company and the candidates.

item.title: Why use a Careers Page builder?
item.description: Creating a standout careers page is crucial for attracting top talent to your organization. A well-designed careers page serves as an online representation of your company culture and values, and is often the first point of contact for potential candidates.
